user.title: Denon AVR Network Receivers
user.description: Connect to your receiver, if the IP address is not set, auto-discovery is used

select.title: Select the receiver that you wish to connect
select.description: Run the setup again if you want to connect additional receivers

abort.not_denonavr_missing: Not a Denon AVR Network Receiver, discovery information not complete
abort.no_mac: Could not retrieve the MAC address from the IP address
